content: **download the pattern for free from isagers webpage 1 ** *the pattern is available in danish english german norwegian swedish and french * **materials** 100 g isager sock yarn work with two strands held together throughout **measurements** circumference in ribbing slightly stretched 40 cm length 30 cm **construction** the sunshine beanie is knitted bottom up and can be knitted in two variations variation 1 cast on using italian cast on technique and work 16 cm k1 - p1 ribbing variantion 2 k2 - p2-rib cast on using twisted cast on or old norwegian cast on/german twisted cast on see illustrations work 24 cm k2 - p2 and then work decreases while knitting the beanie the fabric may seem a bit dense but when washed it will become looser and softer 1 https //isagerstrik dk/en/product/sunshine-beanie/
